plot: This story is set during the Edo ages in Japan. On a rainy night, Kotono confronts the samurais who have killed her father. The samurai attack her one by one, but she manages to withstand them. When she is scaring the remaining samurai away, three ninja's suddenly appear. Will she succeed in beating them as well?   Written by  Anonymous
title: Geisha vs ninja
plot_es: This story is set during the Edo ages in Japan. On a rainy night, Kotono confronts the samurais who have killed her father.
